title: Cleopatra [DVD]
creator_credit: Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation, Walter Wanger and Joseph L Mankiewicz
brief_description: Elizabeth Taylor, Richard Burton and Rex Harrison star in this tale of power and betrayal - the legendary story of the Queen of the Nile and her conquest of Julius Caesar and Marc Antony. An unforgettable portrayal of the beguiling beauty who seduced two of Rome’s greatest soldiers and changed the course of history. Also stars: Pamela Brown, George Cole, Hume Cronyn, Cesare Danova, Kenneth Haigh, Andrew Keir, Martin Landau, Roddy McDowall, Robert Stephens and Francesca Annis. Music by Alex North. Screenplay by Joseph L. Mankiewicz, Ranald MacDougall and Sidney Buchman. Cinematography by Leon Shamroy. (Academy Awards: Cinematography, Art direction, Costumes, Sets and Special effects)
